item.title: Setting Up VirtuaNES Emulator For Retro Gaming On Windows
item.description: I grew up playing all the 90s games and I still love them. For quite a sometime I am now using VirtuaNES emulator to do retro gaming on my Windows machine. There are other NES emulators out there but this is the one I have been using now for a while and it has been good so far. To setup VirtuaNES emulator on Windows, download it from here and here.
